post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Image files can now get attached to posts - three per post, max filesize 512kb per image (please keep them smaller), max upload dimensions 1024*1024 (again, please keep them smaller) and if an image exceeds 640 *640 pixels it'll show up as a text link.

I don't need to mention that uploading inappropriate content results in a ban

For all others - have fun!
